document_title: Pubic lice: Causes, signs, treatment, prevention
subsection_content:
Patients need to see a Dermatologist - Skin Aesthetics specialist in the following cases: (3)
Non-prescription medicinal products are not very effective.; The patient is pregnant.; The patient has abrasions on the skin that are infected due to scratching.
